mapper.select: SELECT lecture_room_id lectureRoomId, permission_id permissionId, lecture_room_name lectureRoomName, lecture_room_capacity lectureRoomCapacity, last_update lastUpdate FROM lecture_room
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture_room( permission_id, lecture_room_name, lecture_room_capacity, last_update ) VALUES( #{permissionId}, #{lectureRoomName}, #{lectureRoomCapacity}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE lecture_room SET lecture_room_id = #{lectureRoomId}, permission_id = #{permissionId}, lecture_room_name = #{lectureRoomName}, lecture_room_capacity = #{lectureRoomCapacity}, last_update = NOW() WHERE lecture_room_id = #{lectureRoomId}
